reference.title: Receipt output format
reference.shortdesc: The receipt prints itemized pizzas, toppings, extra topping lines, then tax and total.

ul.li: For each pizza: size + base price
Extra topping charges for toppings beyond the first 3

section.title: Example (1 Large pizza with 4 toppings)
section.codeblock: Your order: Pizza 1: L 11.99 - HAM - ONION - MUSHROOM - OLIVE Extra Topping (L) 1.00 Tax: 1.69 Total: 14.68

section.title: Behavior when the order is empty
section.p: If pizzaOrder is empty, the generator prints: You did not order anything.
